name: ReadHowYouWant
overview:
The company partners with publishers to provide content in accessible formats. The company has developed technology that allows conversions to be done cost effectively and at high levels of quality. The technology is being used in the service of a social mission which is to provide content at the time of publication to the millions of readers who cannot access a standard printed book.

Beyond the accessibility market, the company is promoting a paradigm shift in the publishing industry. The technology allows readers to choose the format of a book that suits them. The marriage of print on demand with digital files allows readers to select from 7 different sizes of Large Print, which are then printed on demand and shipped to the consumer. Consumers can also choose from a range of digital options including braille, DAISY and synthesized voice mp3.
